Technique: ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle with narrow mouth, flared rim, short neck and unstable base with convex bottom. Orangey-coloured paste and surface with yellowish-orangey coating which is lightly polished. On the exterior we find a painted decoration of a reddish colour consisting of a band with crisscross pattern.
